name: Tax composition – Todaro and Smith (2014)
title: Tax composition – Todaro and Smith (2014)
description: Estimates are provided by the source in two windows of time: 1985-1987 and 1995-1997. We report the estimates for the year in the middle of the corresponding estimates (i.e. 1986 and 1996)

sources.name: Todaro and Smith (2014)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Todaro, M. and Smith, S. (2014) Economic Development, 12th Edition. Pearson. ISBN: 1292002972
sources.dataPublisherSource: National Tax Journal by National Tax Association.
sources.additionalInfo: Estimates are provided by the source in two windows of time: 1985-1987 and 1995-1997. We report the estimates for the year in the middle of the corresponding estimates (i.e. 1986 and 1996)
